trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> is interrupted while it is in a waiting state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 處於等候狀態時被插斷而擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: After a thread is created, it is in one or more <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> states until it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在建立的執行緒之後，就在一或多個<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>指出它終結之前有效。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A> when a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin> state will cause a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> to be thrown in the target thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>當執行緒處於<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>狀態會造成<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>目標執行緒中擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the thread is not in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin> state, the exception is not thrown until the thread enters that state.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒不在<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>狀態，直到執行緒會進入該狀態不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the thread never blocks, it could complete without ever being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒永不封鎖，它可在沒有任何中斷的情況下完成。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED, which has the value 0x80131519.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED，0x80131519 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>, see the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of a running thread when it is interrupted and subsequently gets blocked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示執行中的執行緒行為時中斷，並接著已遭到封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
